info.name: DNS Rebinding Attack
author: ricardomaia
info.description: Detects DNS Rebinding attacks by checking if the DNS response contains a private IPv4 or IPv6 address.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 34033
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;localhost.	IN	 A
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 34033
;; flags: qr aa rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;localhost.	IN	 A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
localhost.	10800	IN	A	127.0.0.1
